#### lecture memo190911
add r, cache=TRUE, eval=FALSE
```{r, cache=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
a <- 2
class(a)
```

add r, cache=FALSE, eval=TRUE
```{r, cache=FALSE, eval=TRUE}
a <- 2
class(a)
```


== is equal to, = is assigning (similar to <-)
